ModuleDescription: This studio-based module develops basic skills in landscape design and marks the ‘first-time experience’ of architecture students in the field of landscape architectural studio work. It leads the students into urban and suburban contexts, where landscape ‘meets’ city and city ‘eats’ landscape.
Prerequisite: AR2101 Design 3 Grade 'C' or Grade “S”; AR2102 Design 4 Grade 'C'
